text: The University of Colorado (CU) is a system of public universities in Colorado. It has four campuses: * University of Colorado Boulder (CU Boulder) in Boulder, Colorado * University of Colorado Colorado Springs (UCCS) in Colorado Springs, Colorado * University of Colorado Denver (CU Denver) in Denver, Colorado * University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus (CU Anschutz) in Aurora, Colorado The University of Colorado Boulder was the first campus. It was built in 1876. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Colorado
title: University of Colorado
